description:
For exceptional legal representation, you need not go downtown. You can get that quality from our attorneys right here in Shakopee, Scott County and surrounding communities.

When you work with the lawyers of Jaspers, Moriarty & Wetherille PA, you work with a law firm that has been serving the community since 1970. Clients just like you from throughout the area look to us for the personalized representation they need in legal matters, both in business and in their personal lives.

Our services include a wide variety of practice areas. For instance, you can work with us if you face legal questions concerning:

  • Business law (contracts, risk management, communication strategies, litigation)
  • Bankruptcy
  • Family law (custody, divorce, child support, child protection )
  • Real Estate (sale/purchase, land use, development, title issues)
  • Estate planning and Probate (including health care directives, wills and trusts, and estate administration and litigation)

We regularly work with businesses throughout the area. In many cases, we serve as the outside counsel those businesses need when they do not maintain their own internal legal department.

Whether we work with your business or with you as an individual, you will be able to count on us to work directly with you so we know you and the unique circumstances of your situation. Doing so enables us to deliver legal services specifically tailored to your unique goals and needs.

*The firm is a debt relief agency. We help people file for bankruptcy relief under the U.S. Bankruptcy Code.
